Container.Name: Immich Kiosk
Container.Changes:
### 2024-09-05
Add environmental variables for configuration
### 2024-09-04
Initial release
Container.Requires: Requires a separate Immich server. Container requires a "config.yaml" file at the "Config File" path BEFORE starting if using config file; otherwise use environmental variables. See the project page for more information: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk?tab=readme-ov-file#configuration

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 3000

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: Config file for application. Remove this if using environmental variables instead.

Config.Name: Immich URL
Config.Description: The URL to the Immich Server

Config.Name: Immich API Key
Config.Description: The API for your Immich server

Config.Name: Disable Kiosk UI
Config.Description: A shortcut to set KIOSK_SHOW_TIME, KIOSK_SHOW_DATE, KIOSK_SHOW_IMAGE_TIME and KIOSK_SHOW_IMAGE_DATE

Config.Name: Show current time
Config.Description: Display current time

Config.Name: Current time format
Config.Description: Display current time in either 12-hour or 24-hour format

Config.Name: Show current date
Config.Description: Display the current date

Config.Name: Current date format
Config.Description: The format of the current date. Any GO date string is valid

Config.Name: Refresh interval
Config.Description: The amount in seconds a image will be displayed for

Config.Name: Specific album
Config.Description: The ID(s) of a specific album or albums you want to display. See FAQ: How do I set multiple albums? to see how to implement this

Config.Name: Specific person
Config.Description: The ID(s) of a specific person or people you want to display. See FAQ: How do I set multiple people? to see how to implement this

Config.Name: Image fit
Config.Description: How your image will fit on the screen. Default is contain. See Image fit for more info

Config.Name: Add blurred background
Config.Description: Display a blurred version of the image as a background

Config.Name: Image transition
Config.Description: Which transition to use when changing images

Config.Name: Show progress bar
Config.Description: Display a progress bar for when image will refresh

Config.Name: Show image time
Config.Description: Display image time from metadata (if available)

Config.Name: Image time format
Config.Description: Display image time in either 12-hour or 24-hour format

Config.Name: Show image date
Config.Description: Display the image date from metadata (if available)

Config.Name: Image date format
Config.Description: The format of the image date. default is day/month/year. Any GO date string is valid.

Config.Name: Password
Config.Description: See FAQs for more info. If set, requests must contain the password in the GET parameters e.g. http://192.168.0.123:3000?password=PASSWORD.

Config.Name: Cache images
Config.Description: Cache selective Immich api calls to reduce unnecessary calls
